SMach Class Reference

State Machine class. More...

#include <SMach.hpp>

Inheritance diagram for SMach:

Detailed Description

The State Machine class is a lightweight, powerful mechanism for implementing state machines. SMach inherits State so that state machines can execute within state machines.

Definition at line 14 of file SMach.hpp.
